tier.item: '[Do you want] white powder or yellow powder?'
[Do you want] white powder or yellow powder?
'It is said that an adulterous man went on a trip'.
It is said that an adulterous man went on a trip'.
As he went on that trip, ...
'... the wife stayed behind alone with her children.'
the wife stayed behind alone with her children.
(5) miski-:ku- `to be very sweet', < miski- `to be sweet'
miski-:ku-`to be very sweet', < miski-`to be sweet

a-ru-`to arrive (perfective) < a:-`to arrive, to be cooked

a:-ci `to cook' < a:-`to arrive, to be cooked

punu-ci-`to put to sleep' < punu-`to sleep

yanaba:-ku-`to always help', `to be inclined to help
They let each other be beaten.
`He is causing them to beat each other.'
He is causing them to beat each other.
qarku-, qargu- `to drive or herd upwards'
qarku-, qargu-`to drive or herd upwards
qarpu-, qarbu- `to drive or herd downwards'
qarpu-, qarbu-`to drive or herd downwards
qayku-, qaygu-`to drive or herd inwards'15
qayku-, qaygu-`to drive or herd inwards'15
urpu-, urbu- `to put (food) in the pan'
urpu-, urbu-`to put (food) in the pan
`I will go down to sleep in a lower place and then come back up here.'
I will go down to sleep in a lower place and then come back up here.
With difficulty I managed to sleep.'17
`Watch out, you may fall asleep (if you do not take care)!'
Watch out, you may fall asleep (if you do not take care)!
`He has finally slept for quite a while.'
He has finally slept for quite a while.
`He does not go.' `He has not gone.' `He is not going.'
He does not go.' `He has not gone.' `He is not going.
`I shall let go (of the balloon), if you agree.'
I shall let go (of the balloon), if you agree.
`Once they have fallen down, they remain piled up on the ground.'
Once they have fallen down, they remain piled up on the ground.
`After cutting off her hand, the woman gave it to him.'
After cutting off her hand, the woman gave it to him.
`After turning stone into mud, they would build houses.'
After turning stone into mud, they would build houses.
`to the place where he is lying down'
to the place where he is lying down
`Take a little peek inside!' `Have a look inside!'
Take a little peek inside!' `Have a look inside!

meta.line-types: L G L G T T

tier.item: `After putting the clay pot on the fire, we cut up the leaves of the is-
maycu plant and drop it (in the pot).'
After putting the clay pot on the fire, we cut up the leaves of the is-
maycu plant and drop it (in the pot).
(lit.: `after (carefully) placing each other at opposite sides')
standing in front of each other

`I broke myself (i.e. I broke my ankle, leg, etc.).'
I broke myself (i.e. I broke my ankle, leg, etc.).
